#summary DRAFT overview of all table components in the incubator and how they fit together.
#labels Type-Widget
=Advanced Grids=
The incubator includes many `Grid` based classes. Any class descended from `FixedWidthGrid` may be used as the table body for a `ScrollTable`.
 
  * `HoverGrid` 

  * `FixedWidthGrid`
  * `SortableFixedWidthGrid`
  * `PagingFixedWidthGrid`
  * `EditableFixedWidthGrid`

=Core GWT Table classes=
`HTMLTable`, `Grid`, and `FlexTable` are all core GWT classes. Their documentation is [http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/documentation/com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HTMLTable.html here]
